alert.note: Alert for Campbell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 4:14PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL CAMPBELL, SOUTHEASTERN HAMILTON AND NORTHERN CLERMONT COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Melbourne, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Fort Thomas, Loveland, Milford, Forestville, Amelia, Terrace Park, Batavia, Silver Grove, Melbourne, Salem Heights, Camp Dennison, Riverbend And Coney Island, Withamsville, Coldstream, Plainville, The Village of Indian Hill, Newtown, Sherwood and Owensville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
